```{r include=FALSE} 
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
us_ski <- read_csv(here("data/ski_resorts.csv"))
```


```{r}
us_ski <- us_ski |> separate(resort_name,
                             sep = ",",
                             into = c("resort", "state_abbr"))
```
